name: TheSpaceBetween
description:
I accidentally deleted the files and had to start everything from scratch today.

The art was made for 10 days but the programming was done during 5-6 hours. This was absolutely insane, would not recommend doing that.

There is no pause menu because you are stuck in Limbo, and not because I did not have enough time for it.

Credits:

Lusitano  - Programming

Hardiment : Art/Music
